title: Digital Transformation Simulation-Based Numeracy Enhancement Program for Corporate Technical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical concepts and experience in analyzing manufacturing field data
context.additional_context: Learning design centered on digital transformation case studies reflecting changes in practicing professionalsâ€™ work environments. Implements real-time problem-solving scenarios using VR.

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical modeling (statistics, linear algebra) for optimizing manufacturing processes with 85% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can perform regression analysis using simulation tools (e.g., MATLAB VR interface) to address data challenges arising during digital transformation.
By analyzing episode-based cases, learners can identify at least three organizational resistance factors when introducing digital learning tools and propose improvement strategies.
